snippet.title: Miska - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
A first peak at what’s to come in 🌱Miska 🌱 We’re super excited to show you what we’ve been working on. 😊

We’re busy planting more seeds along the trail up Mt Miska ⛰ so get your hiking shoes ready!

MISKA is a narrative-driven adventure game with a strong focus on exploring Australian flora and fauna. You play as a woman returning to a fictional Australian National Park that she used to visit as a child. The Park has fallen into disarray; you spend the game picking up rubbish, rekindling your connection to family and nature through acts of restoration.

✨ Keep up to date with Miska ✨
https://twitter.com/UmbrellaPartyCo
https://www.facebook.com/gaming/UmbrellaPartyCo
